channel.title: Looking for VB6 help, (My first program)
channel.description:
Hey everyone. I'm looking into making my first VB program, I've looked and looked but i cannot find the source code to send e-mails. Here's what i want my form to do:
Send all the information from the text boxes to my e-mail address..
I have the program (appearance) done. All i want now is to get that sorted, please someone PM me or reply A.S.A.P!

item.title: Looking for VB6 help, (My first program)
item.dc:creator: @Daed Daed
item.description:
@Daed wrote:

Hey mate, goto this site http://www.pscode.com and search for stuff, its a nice way to learn also reading through others code.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for VB6 help, (My first program)
item.dc:creator: @Zameix Zameix
item.description:
@Zameix wrote:

Ok, so if i host a .php file of some sort i can store the entered information there in a visible form.

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for VB6 help, (My first program)

item.title: Looking for VB6 help, (My first program)
item.dc:creator: @sh_ft sh!ft
item.description:
@sh_ft wrote:

VB is weak, and rather slow.

Emailing yourself from a program means you have to make it connect to some sort of SMTP server OR simply write a php page that databases the information.

Sending an email is not so much “VB” as it is a socket managed session… Look into using Winsock (I think vb supports winsock)…

But like I said, a php page for vb would be easier, make an internet explorer plugin (invisibly) and tell the plugin to load the page with the arguments of the text box’s.

Good luck.

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for VB6 help, (My first program)
